paint_colors.title: Approved Paint Colors
paint_colors.content: Exterior paint colors must be from the approved color palette

fences.title: Fence Requirements
fences.content: Fences must be approved and cannot exceed 6 feet in height

registration.title: Pet Registration
registration.content: All pets must be registered with the management office within 30 days

leash_policy.title: Leash Requirements
leash_policy.content: Dogs must be on leash at all times when outside of owner's unit

assigned_spaces.title: Assigned Parking Spaces
assigned_spaces.content: Each unit is assigned two parking spaces

short_term.title: Short-term Rental Restrictions
short_term.content: Short-term rentals of less than 30 days are prohibited

quiet_hours.title: Quiet Hours
quiet_hours.content: Quiet hours are from 10:00 PM to 7:00 AM daily
